title: MBMBaM 574: My Burger My Burger and Me
description:
Hey, Guy Fieri, we have a food business idea. We can’t tell you the exact details right now, but trust us it’s amazing. It involves memes. All you have to do is sign this exclusive contract. 

Suggested talking points: The Spice is Nice, Bathtub Speedboat, There’s Lots of Stuff You Can Eat, Omni-directional hoof action, Brown Town

Support AAPI communities and those affected by anti-Asian violence: https://www.gofundme.com/c/act/stop-aapi-hate 

For resources on anti-racism and fighting police violence: https://blacklivesmatters.carrd.co/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
